thread.title: Tawauna Renea Mcclendon
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Tawauna Renea Mcclendon

author: Tawauna Renea Mcclendon
title: Tawauna Renea Mcclendon
text: I was really amazed at the customer service. Chris Cooper helped me as soon as I walked through the door. He offered to show me around but I declined because I came in knowing what I wanted. Chris informed me about the value and quality of the bedroom set I wanted, and I walked out a happy customer. I was also impressed with the wood work of the bed the picture in the ad didn't do any justice. In person it was a more beautiful set.
